description: 卡通农场(Hay Day)游戏中的英语词汇 - Phase 1 精选50词

cards.definition_zh: 小麦是一种重要的谷物作物,是制作面粉、面包和许多其他食品的基础原料。在卡通农场中,小麦是最基础的农作物,生长时间仅需2分钟,是新手玩家的首选作物。
cards.definition_en: A cereal grain that is a staple food used to make flour, bread, and many other products. It's the first and fastest-growing crop in Hay Day.
cards.example_en: Plant wheat in your field and harvest it after 2 minutes.
cards.example_zh: 在你的田地里种植小麦,2分钟后收获。

cards.definition_zh: 玉米是一种营养丰富的谷物,既可以直接食用,也可以加工成多种食品和饲料。在游戏中,玉米是第二种解锁的作物,生长时间为5分钟,可用于制作玉米面包、爆米花等产品。
cards.definition_en: A cereal grain that can be eaten fresh or processed into various foods and animal feed. Essential for making corn bread and popcorn.
cards.example_en: Corn takes 5 minutes to grow and is used in many recipes.
cards.example_zh: 玉米需要5分钟生长,用于许多配方中。

cards.definition_zh: 大豆是一种高蛋白质的豆类作物,是素食主义者重要的蛋白质来源。在游戏中,大豆在5级解锁,生长时间为20分钟,主要用于制作豆腐、酱油等产品和动物饲料。
cards.definition_en: A legume high in protein, used to make tofu, soy sauce, and animal feed. Unlocked at level 5 with a 20-minute growth time.
cards.example_en: Soybeans are perfect for making nutritious animal feed.
cards.example_zh: 大豆非常适合制作营养丰富的动物饲料。

cards.definition_zh: 甘蔗是制糖的主要原料,茎秆中含有丰富的糖分。在游戏中,甘蔗在7级解锁,生长时间为30分钟,用于制作白糖、红糖等甜味剂。
cards.definition_en: A tall grass plant from which sugar is extracted. Takes 30 minutes to grow and is used to make white and brown sugar.
cards.example_en: Harvest sugarcane to make sweet brown sugar for your products.
cards.example_zh: 收获甘蔗来为你的产品制作甜美的红糖。

cards.definition_zh: 胡萝卜是一种根茎类蔬菜,富含维生素A和胡萝卜素,对视力有益。在游戏中,胡萝卜在9级解锁,生长时间为10分钟,可用于制作胡萝卜派、胡萝卜蛋糕等美食。
cards.definition_en: An orange root vegetable rich in vitamin A and beta-carotene. Used to make carrot pie and carrot cake in the game.
cards.example_en: Plant carrots to make delicious carrot pie for your customers.
cards.example_zh: 种植胡萝卜为你的顾客制作美味的胡萝卜派。

cards.definition_zh: 靛蓝是一种用于提取天然蓝色染料的植物,在历史上被广泛用于纺织品染色。在游戏中,靛蓝在13级解锁,生长时间为45分钟,用于制作蓝色染料。
cards.definition_en: A plant used to extract natural blue dye, historically used for coloring textiles. Takes 45 minutes to grow and is used to make blue dye.
cards.example_en: Grow indigo plants to produce beautiful blue dyes for your products.
cards.example_zh: 种植靛蓝植物来为你的产品制作美丽的蓝色染料。

cards.definition_zh: 南瓜是一种大型的葫芦科蔬菜,富含营养,常用于制作汤、派等食品。在游戏中,南瓜在15级解锁,生长时间为3小时,用于制作南瓜派等季节性美食。
cards.definition_en: A large orange gourd vegetable often used in pies and soups. Takes 3 hours to grow and is perfect for making pumpkin pie.
cards.example_en: Grow pumpkins in autumn to make festive pumpkin pie.
cards.example_zh: 在秋天种植南瓜来制作节日南瓜派。

cards.definition_zh: 苹果是一种甜美的水果,富含纤维和维生素。在游戏中,苹果树需要在农场上种植,每棵树可以收获多次。
cards.definition_en: A sweet fruit rich in fiber and vitamins. Apple trees can be harvested multiple times.

cards.definition_zh: 棉花不是食用作物,而是纺织原料,用于制作各种布料和衣物。在游戏中,棉花在18级解锁,生长时间为2小时,用于制作棉布衬衫、毛线帽等纺织品。
cards.definition_en: A soft, fluffy fiber used to make textiles and clothing. Not edible, but essential for making cotton shirts and other fabric items.
cards.example_en: Harvest cotton to weave cloth for making shirts and sweaters.
cards.example_zh: 收获棉花来编织布料制作衬衫和毛衣。

cards.definition_zh: 覆盆子是一种小巧的红色浆果,味道酸甜可口,富含抗氧化剂。
cards.definition_en: A small red berry that is sweet-tart and rich in antioxidants.

cards.definition_zh: 樱桃是一种小而圆的红色水果,味道甜美,常用于制作果酱和甜点。
cards.definition_en: A small, round red fruit that is sweet and commonly used in jams and desserts.

cards.definition_zh: 辣椒是一种辛辣的蔬菜,富含维生素C和辣椒素,可以为食物增添辣味。在游戏中,辣椒在25级解锁,生长时间为2小时,用于制作辣味食品。
cards.definition_en: A spicy vegetable rich in vitamin C and capsaicin that adds heat to dishes. Takes 2 hours to grow and is used for spicy recipes.
cards.example_en: Harvest chili peppers to make spicy salsa and hot sauces.
cards.example_zh: 收获辣椒来制作辣味沙拉酱和辣酱。

cards.definition_zh: 黑莓是一种深紫色的浆果,富含维生素和矿物质,味道酸甜可口。
cards.definition_en: A dark purple berry rich in vitamins and minerals with a sweet-tart flavor.

cards.definition_zh: 番茄是一种红色的果实蔬菜,富含维生素C和番茄红素。在游戏中,番茄在30级解锁,生长时间为2小时,可用于制作番茄汁、披萨酱等产品。
cards.definition_en: A red fruit-vegetable rich in vitamin C and lycopene. Used to make tomato juice, pizza sauce, and many other products.
cards.example_en: Fresh tomatoes are perfect for making healthy tomato juice.
cards.example_zh: 新鲜番茄非常适合制作健康的番茄汁。

cards.definition_zh: 蓝莓是一种小型的蓝紫色浆果,富含抗氧化剂,被誉为超级食物。在游戏中,蓝莓在30级解锁,用于制作蓝莓派和果汁。
cards.definition_en: Small blue-purple berries rich in antioxidants, considered a superfood. Used to make blueberry pie and juices.
cards.example_en: Pick fresh blueberries to bake delicious blueberry muffins.
cards.example_zh: 采摘新鲜蓝莓来烘焙美味的蓝莓松饼。

cards.definition_zh: 草莓是一种红色的心形浆果,味道香甜,深受人们喜爱,富含维生素C。
cards.definition_en: A red, heart-shaped berry that is sweet and beloved, rich in vitamin C.

cards.definition_zh: 土豆是一种重要的根茎类作物,富含淀粉和营养,可以用多种方式烹饪。在游戏中,土豆在35级解锁,用于制作薯条、土豆泥等食品。
cards.definition_en: An important root vegetable rich in starch and nutrients that can be cooked in many ways. Used to make fries and mashed potatoes.
cards.example_en: Grow potatoes to make crispy french fries for your customers.
cards.example_zh: 种植土豆来为你的顾客制作酥脆的炸薯条。

cards.definition_zh: 可可是巧克力的原料,来自可可树的种子。在游戏中,可可在36级解锁,生长时间较长,用于制作巧克力和可可粉。
cards.definition_en: The source of chocolate, made from cacao tree seeds. Unlocked at level 36 and used to make chocolate and cocoa powder.
cards.example_en: Harvest cacao pods to produce rich chocolate products.
cards.example_zh: 收获可可豆荚来生产浓郁的巧克力产品。

cards.definition_zh: 咖啡豆是咖啡饮料的原料,经过烘焙后具有独特的香气和风味。在游戏中,咖啡豆在42级解锁,用于制作各种咖啡饮品。
cards.definition_en: The raw material for coffee beverages, with unique aroma and flavor after roasting. Used to make various coffee drinks.
cards.example_en: Grow coffee beans to brew fresh espresso for your café.
cards.example_zh: 种植咖啡豆来为你的咖啡馆冲泡新鲜浓缩咖啡。

cards.definition_zh: 洋甘菊是一种具有药用价值的草本植物,常用于制作舒缓镇静的花草茶。在游戏中,洋甘菊在45级解锁,用于制作洋甘菊茶。
cards.definition_en: A medicinal herb commonly used to make soothing and calming herbal tea. Unlocked at level 45 for making chamomile tea.
cards.example_en: Harvest chamomile flowers to brew relaxing herbal tea.
cards.example_zh: 收获洋甘菊花朵来冲泡放松的花草茶。

cards.definition_zh: 鸡是农场中最基础的动物,在1级就可以解锁。母鸡每隔一段时间会产下鸡蛋,鸡蛋可以用于制作煎蛋、蛋糕等多种食品。鸡需要放在鸡舍中饲养,并定期喂食鸡饲料。
cards.definition_en: The first farm animal you unlock. Chickens lay eggs regularly, which are essential ingredients for many recipes like bacon and eggs, cakes, and cookies.
cards.example_en: Feed your chickens regularly to collect fresh eggs every day.
cards.example_zh: 定期喂养你的鸡以每天收集新鲜鸡蛋。

cards.definition_zh: 奶牛在6级解锁,是农场的重要动物。奶牛每隔一段时间会产出牛奶,牛奶可以用于制作奶油、黄油、奶酪、冰淇淋等多种乳制品。奶牛需要住在牛棚里,并喂食牛饲料。
cards.definition_en: Cows produce milk, which is used to make cream, butter, cheese, and ice cream. They must be housed in cow sheds and fed with cow feed.
cards.example_en: Your cows produce fresh milk that can be turned into delicious dairy products.
cards.example_zh: 你的奶牛生产新鲜牛奶,可以制成美味的乳制品。

cards.definition_zh: 猪在10级解锁。猪可以生产培根,这是一种美味的腌制猪肉,可用于制作培根鸡蛋、培根派等食品。猪需要住在猪圈里,并喂食猪饲料。
cards.definition_en: Pigs produce bacon, a cured meat product used in recipes like bacon and eggs, bacon pie, and hamburgers. Pigs live in pig pens and eat pig feed.
cards.example_en: Raise pigs on your farm to harvest bacon for cooking delicious meals.
cards.example_zh: 在农场饲养猪来收获培根烹饪美味佳肴。

cards.definition_zh: 绵羊在16级解锁。绵羊生产羊毛,羊毛是制作各种纺织品的重要原料,可以用来制作毛衣、羊毛帽、羊毛裤等服装。绵羊需要住在羊圈里,并喂食羊饲料。
cards.definition_en: Sheep produce wool, which is essential for making clothing items like sweaters, woolly hats, and wooly chaps. They live in sheep pens and need sheep feed.
cards.example_en: Shear your sheep regularly to collect soft wool for knitting warm clothes.
cards.example_zh: 定期剪你的羊毛来收集柔软的羊毛编织保暖衣物。

cards.definition_zh: 山羊在32级解锁。山羊生产羊奶,羊奶可以用来制作山羊奶酪、披萨等特色食品。山羊需要住在山羊棚里,并喂食山羊饲料。
cards.definition_en: Goats produce goat milk, which is used to make goat cheese and pizza. Goats need goat sheds and goat feed to thrive.
cards.example_en: Goat milk makes excellent cheese that customers love in pizza recipes.
cards.example_zh: 羊奶制作出顾客喜爱的优质奶酪,用于披萨配方。

cards.definition_zh: 蜜蜂在39级解锁。蜜蜂生产蜂巢,蜂巢可以加工成蜂蜜。蜂蜜是一种天然甜味剂,可用于制作蜂蜜爆米花、蜂蜜苹果蛋糕等美食。蜜蜂住在蜂箱里,不需要喂食。
cards.definition_en: Honey bees produce honeycombs, which can be processed into honey. Honey is a natural sweetener used in many recipes. Bees live in beehives and don't require feed.
cards.example_en: Your bees work hard to produce sweet honey for delicious treats.
cards.example_zh: 你的蜜蜂勤劳工作生产甜美的蜂蜜制作美味佳肴。

cards.definition_zh: 鸭子在50级解锁。鸭子生产鸭毛,鸭毛可以用来制作枕头、羽绒服等舒适的产品。鸭子需要住在鸭舍里,并喂食鸭饲料。
cards.definition_en: Ducks produce duck feathers, which are used to make pillows and down jackets. Ducks live in duck salons and need to be fed duck feed.
cards.example_en: Collect duck feathers to craft soft, comfortable pillows for your customers.
cards.example_zh: 收集鸭毛为顾客制作柔软舒适的枕头。

cards.definition_zh: 松鼠在62级解锁。松鼠会收集花生,花生可以用于制作花生酱、花生糖等食品。松鼠需要住在松鼠屋里。
cards.definition_en: Squirrels collect peanuts, which are used to make peanut butter, peanut brittle, and other snacks. They live in squirrel houses.
cards.example_en: Watch your squirrels gather peanuts to make tasty peanut butter.
cards.example_zh: 看你的松鼠收集花生来制作美味的花生酱。

cards.definition_zh: 大象是陆地上最大的动物,拥有长长的鼻子和大耳朵。在保护区中,可以饲养成年大象和小象。
cards.definition_en: The largest land animal with a long trunk and big ears. Both adults and calves can be raised in the sanctuary.

cards.definition_zh: 长颈鹿拥有世界上最长的脖子,可以吃到高处的树叶。它们的斑点图案非常独特。
cards.definition_en: Has the world's longest neck to reach high leaves. Each giraffe's spot pattern is unique.

cards.definition_zh: 河马是半水生的大型哺乳动物,喜欢在水中度过大部分时间,但实际上不会游泳。
cards.definition_en: A large semi-aquatic mammal that spends most of its time in water but cannot actually swim.

cards.definition_zh: 斑马以其独特的黑白条纹而闻名,每只斑马的条纹图案都是独一无二的。
cards.definition_en: Famous for its unique black and white stripes. Each zebra's stripe pattern is one of a kind.

cards.definition_zh: 大猩猩是最大的灵长类动物,非常聪明,与人类DNA相似度达98%。
cards.definition_en: The largest primate, highly intelligent with 98% DNA similarity to humans.

cards.definition_zh: 驯鹿生活在寒冷地区,是圣诞老人雪橇队的成员。它们的鹿角非常雄伟。
cards.definition_en: Lives in cold regions and is a member of Santa's sleigh team. They have magnificent antlers.

cards.definition_zh: 北极狐生活在极地地区,拥有厚厚的毛皮来抵御严寒。
cards.definition_en: Arctic foxes live in polar regions with thick fur to withstand extreme cold.

cards.definition_zh: 猎豹是陆地上跑得最快的动物,时速可达120公里。它们身上有独特的黑色斑点。
cards.definition_en: The fastest land animal, capable of speeds up to 120 km/h. They have distinctive black spots.

cards.definition_zh: 海象生活在北极地区,拥有长长的獠牙,可以用来在冰上移动和防御。
cards.definition_en: Lives in Arctic regions with long tusks used for moving on ice and defense.

cards.definition_zh: 狐獴是小型群居动物,经常站立起来警戒周围环境,非常机警可爱。
cards.definition_en: Small social animals that often stand upright to watch their surroundings, very alert and adorable.

cards.definition_zh: 鱼类在27级随渔湖解锁。不同于其他农场动物,鱼需要在渔湖中垂钓捕获。鱼可以加工成鱼片,用于制作炸鱼薯条、寿司等海鲜菜肴。
cards.definition_en: Fish are caught in the fishing lake and can be processed into fish fillets. Used to make fish and chips, sushi, and other seafood dishes.
cards.example_en: Catch fresh fish from the lake and fillet them for tasty seafood recipes.
cards.example_zh: 从湖中捕捉新鲜的鱼并切成鱼片做美味的海鲜菜肴。

cards.definition_zh: 龙虾在44级解锁,在渔湖中捕获。龙虾可以加工成龙虾尾,这是一种高级海鲜食材,用于制作各种精致菜肴。
cards.definition_en: Lobsters are caught in the fishing lake and provide lobster tails, a premium seafood ingredient used in gourmet recipes.
cards.example_en: Lobster tails are a delicacy that fetch high prices at the roadside shop.
cards.example_zh: 龙虾尾是一种美味佳肴,在路边小店可以卖高价。

cards.definition_zh: 狗是人类忠实的朋友。在游戏中,狗作为宠物可以在农场自由活动,喂养它们可以获得经验值和道具奖励。
cards.definition_en: Man's best friend. Dogs are pets that roam freely on the farm and provide experience and rewards when fed.

cards.definition_zh: 猫是可爱的宠物,喜欢在农场四处探索。喂养猫咪可以获得各种奖励。
cards.definition_en: Cute pets that love to explore the farm. Feeding cats provides various rewards.

cards.definition_zh: 鸡蛋是农场中最基础的动物产品,由母鸡产出。鸡蛋富含蛋白质,可以用来制作煎蛋、蛋糕、饼干等多种食品。
cards.definition_en: Eggs are produced by chickens and are essential ingredients for many recipes.
cards.example_en: Collect fresh eggs from your chickens to make delicious breakfast items.
cards.example_zh: 从鸡舍收集新鲜鸡蛋来制作美味的早餐。

cards.definition_zh: 牛奶是奶牛生产的白色营养液体,富含钙质和蛋白质。牛奶是制作各种乳制品的基础原料。
cards.definition_en: Milk is produced by cows and serves as the base ingredient for many dairy products.

cards.definition_zh: 培根是用猪肉腌制和烟熏制成的肉制品,味道咸香可口。
cards.definition_en: Bacon is a cured and smoked pork product with a savory, salty flavor.

cards.definition_zh: 羊毛是从绵羊身上剪下的天然纤维,柔软保暖,用于制作纺织品和服装。
cards.definition_en: Wool is a natural fiber sheared from sheep, soft and warm, used for making textiles and clothing.

cards.definition_zh: 蜂蜜是蜜蜂采集花蜜酿造的天然甜味剂,营养丰富,具有独特的香甜味道。
cards.definition_en: Honey is a natural sweetener produced by bees from flower nectar, rich in nutrients with a unique sweet flavor.

cards.definition_zh: 面包是用小麦面粉烘焙而成的主食,是人类最古老的食物之一。
cards.definition_en: Bread is a staple food baked from wheat flour, one of humanity's oldest foods.

cards.definition_zh: 黄油是通过搅拌奶油制成的固体乳制品,富含脂肪和维生素。
cards.definition_en: Butter is a solid dairy product made by churning cream, rich in fat and vitamins.

cards.definition_zh: 奶酪是通过凝固牛奶蛋白质制成的乳制品,有独特的风味和口感。
cards.definition_en: Cheese is a dairy product made by curdling milk proteins, with unique flavors and textures.
